item.title: Americano
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml Campari
  • 45 ml sweet vermouth
  • 45 ml soda water
  • (garnish) orange slice

Instructions

Build in rocks glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Mojito
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rum
  • 20 ml lime juice
  • 20 ml sugar syrup
  • a few mint leaves
  • soda water
  • (garnish) mint sprig

Instructions

Crush ice in clean tea towel. Lightly clap mint. Add ingredients except soda to highball glass. Add crushed ice and stir briefly, and top with soda water. Garnish.

item.title: Paloma
item.description:
Note: you can make the drink fancy by substituting the grapefruit soda for grapefruit juice, agave syrup, and soda water.

Ingredients

  • 60 ml tequila
  • 120 ml grapefruit soda
  • 5 ml lime juice
  • pinch of salt
  • (garnish) lime wedge

Instructions

Mix together in a highball glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Scotch and soda
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml Scotch
  • 90 ml soda water

Instructions

Build in rocks glass over ice.

item.title: Spritz Veneziano
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml prosecco
  • 45 ml Aperol
  • 20 ml soda water
  • (garnish) orange slice
  • (garnish) olive

Instructions

Build in wine glass over ice. Garnish.

item.title: Tom Collins
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml gin
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • soda water
  • (garnish) lemon or lime slice

Instructions

Add ingredients except soda to highball glass and stir to combine. Add soda water to halfway up glass. Fill glass with ice. Garnish.
